text: John Quayle is the name of the following people: *John Quayle (actor) (born 1938), English actor *John Quayle (advocate, b. 1693) (1693–1755), Manx lawyer who became the Clerk of the Rolls on the Isle of Man *John Quayle (Judge, b. 1725), Manx-born advocate who succeeded his father as Clerk of the Rolls *John Quayle (politician) (1868 – 1930), American politician *John Quayle (rugby league) (born 1947), Australian rugby league footballer and administrator
title: John Quayle
